name: Art Cafe Art Fight 2022 - Game Jam
name_original: Art Cafe Art Fight 2022 - Game Jam
description:
Dynamic clicker game made for Art Cafe Discord Server Art Fight, 2022.

43 hours of coding and art, all made by me, except for 2 of the character sprites, thanks to Sosamche. https://twitter.com/Sosamche

Didn't have enough time to flesh out some of the mechanics, but I'm content with the current state.
